title: Help identifying a font
content:
I've been searching on almost every free font website  
trying to find this font on the sign I found online.  
Any help would be greatly appreciated.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [il\_fullxfull\_335694696.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822043332/http:/typophile.com/files/il_fullxfull_335694696.jpg) | 89.53 KB |
author: primsigns

comments.content:
Is not exactly this one, but is the closest thing I've found  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/wagner-grotesk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822043332/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/wagner-grotesk/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/wagner-grotesk/")

You should have written this post in th TypeID forum:  
 [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822043332/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")

Cheers!

Why only look on free-font sites?

hhp
